'''''An Eye for an Eye''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to destroy a [[Bullet Barnacle]] by aiming the [[Xenochromatic Creature|Xenochromatic Armored Crab]]'s ability and releasing a counterattack.
